title: Facility Officer Job at Bricklane Consulting
content:
Bricklane Consulting, a recruitment consulting firm, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Officer

Job Locations: Ajah & Magodo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: 7:00AM - 5:00PM; Monday- Sunday, two days off

Description


	Our company is searching for a qualified facilities manager to work alongside security and maintenance staff to ensure our buildings and grounds are clean and safe.


Key Responsibilities

title: Sales Manager Job at Johnvents Industries Limited
content:
Johnvents Foods Limited launched Johnvents Pure Cocoa Powder, an everyday beverage that provides 100% cocoa nourishment. It acquired and set up a cocoa product factory in Idanre for the production of Oluji Pure Cocoa Powder, Johnvents Chocolate drink, Cocoa Pops, Cocoa Cube, and other cocoa-based consumer products.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



At Johnvents Foods, the goal is to create nourishing experiences that foster happiness, build bonds and nurture unforgettable moments. Whether you’re hosting a special occasion, enjoying an intimate dinner for two, or simply treating yourself to a moment of food bliss, you can be sure of an unforgettable moment filled with nourishment, innovative flavors, treasured memories, and sensational experiences. This is because we believe food is a catalyst for creating meaningful experiences that nourish both the body and the soul.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager

Job Locations: Kaduna, Niger, Gombe, Lagos, Oyo, Ekiti, Osogbo - Osun, Onitsha - Anambra, Edo and Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you a passionate, target-driven sales professional ready to take your career to the next level? We are hiring Sales Managers across several locations in Nigeria!


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage sales operations within the assigned territory
	Develop and adapt state-level plans to meet local market dynamics.
	Recruit, train, supervise, and evaluate Sales Representatives.
	Set sales targets for the team and monitor performance.
	Identify and grow new business opportunities within the state.
	Expand distribution channels and increase market share.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with key customers, distributors, and retailers.
	Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and service delivery.
	Track sales performance metrics and provide regular reports to the Regional/National Sales Manager.
	Monitor competitors’ activities and market trends.
	Ensure efficient stock movement, proper territory coverage, and route planning and collaborate with logistics and supply chain teams for timely products delivery.
	Drive revenue and volume targets within the state.
	Plan and oversee promotional activities, trade activations, and market storms.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
	Minimum of 4 - 5 years of experience in sales management.
	Strong leadership and communication skills.
	Ability to thrive in a target-driven environment.


Why Join Us?


	Competitive salary and incentives.
	Growth and career advancement opportunities.
	Supportive and performance-driven culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and location of interest to: humanresources_foods@johnvents.com using "Sales Manager – (Preferred Location)" as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at The Concept Group
content:
The Concept Group is a holding company for companies established in 1992. Subsidiaries under the Group include: Rosabon Financial Services - Nigeria Leading Equipment Leasing and Financial Intermediary Company, Concept Nova - Bespoke Enterprise Software Development Company, Percy Aitkins - Bureau De Change.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Deputy Manager, Marketing & Communications

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Scope and Impact
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Deputy Manager, Marketing & Communications plays a key role in executing and supporting the organization’s marketing, brand, and communication strategies.
	This position is responsible for ensuring consistent messaging, driving audience engagement, supporting integrated campaigns, and enhancing brand visibility and reputation across all internaland external touchpoints.


Job Summary


	The Deputy Manager, Marketing & Communications plays a key role in executing integrated marketing strategies and managing brand communications across multiple platforms.
	The role supports planning, coordinating, and implementing campaigns that drive brand visibility, engagement, and business growth.
	It involves working with creative agencies, media vendors, internal teams, and external stakeholders to ensure consistent brand messaging and effective communication delivery.


Responsibilities
Marketing Strategy & Execution:


	Support the development and implementation of annual marketing plans and campaigns.
	Coordinate integrated marketing efforts across traditional, digital, and experiential platforms.
	Ensure all campaigns align with brand positioning and strategic objectives.
	Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance and ROI.


Brand Management:


	Ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints, including content, design, and communications.
	Work with creative teams, agencies, and internal stakeholders to develop marketing materials and content.
	Lead the development and rollout of brand guidelines and toolkits.


Public Relations:


	Manage the perception and image of the brand through media relations, stakeholders’ engagement, writing and publishing of feature stores, press releases and op eds.


Internal & External Communications: 


	Draft and manage corporate communications such as press releases, speeches, newsletters, and internal memos.
	Serve as a liaison with PR agencies and media outlets for coverage, partnerships, and crisis management.
	Support internal communications to foster a strong company culture and employee engagement.


Events, Sponsorships & Activations:


	Plan and manage events, sponsorships, and brand activations, ensuring alignment with brand strategy.
	Work with vendors, partners, and internal teams to deliver seamless event experiences.


Stakeholder & Team Collaboration:


	Work closely with Sales, Strategy, Product, and HR teams to support cross-functional initiatives.
	Supervise and guide junior marketing staff, interns, and agency partners as needed.


Key Performance Indicators


	Campaign engagement and conversion metrics
	Brand awareness and sentiment improvement
	Media coverage and public perception metrics
	Internal stakeholder satisfaction and cross-functional collaboration
	On-time, on-budget delivery of projects and campaigns


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Public Relations, or related field
	5+ years of relevant experience in marketing, brand, or communications
	Master’s degree or professional certification (e.g., CIM, NIMN, APCON, Digital Marketing) is an added advantage
	Proven track record of supporting or leading successful marketing campaigns
	Industry experience in media, financial services, retail, telecom, or FMCG is a plus
	Familiarity with SEC and regulatory guidelines relating to investment promotions.
	Strong understanding of financial products and investment terminology.


Job Knowledge:


	Marketing Strategy Development: Sound knowledge of creating and executing marketing plans across digital, ATL, and BTL channels.
	Content Creation & Storytelling: Ability to develop compelling content across mediums including social media, TV, print, and PR.
	Campaign Management: Skilled in end-to-end campaign planning, budgeting, execution, and performance evaluation.
	Media Planning & Buying: Understanding of media mix optimization, audience targeting, and negotiation with media houses.
	Digital Marketing: Knowledge of SEO, social media management, Google Ads, email marketing, and analytics.
	Brand Management: Deep understanding of brand equity, identity systems, and maintaining brand consistency.
	Internal & External Communications: Experience in managing press releases, crisis communication, and stakeholder messaging.
	Creative and Agency Collaboration: Familiarity with briefing, reviewing, andmanaging agencies to deliveron-brand materials.


Skills / Competencies:


	Strong verbal and written communication skills
	Project management and multitasking ability
	Creativity and a good eye for design and messaging
	Knowledge of digital marketing tools and platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Meta Ads, Mailchimp, etc.)
	Strategic thinking with attention to detail
	Media relations andcrisis communicationexperience (a plus)


Salary
N550,000 - N600,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: careers@conceptgroup-ng.com using the Job Title as the subject of the email.

 

2.) Treasury Officer (Funds Mobilization/ Wealth Management)

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Treasury Officer is responsible for building and managing strategic relationships for fixed deposit customers, serving as the single point of contact for new business as well as existing portfolios.
	He/She will manage the funds of HNI (high net worth) customers.


Responsibilities


	Source appropriately priced and structured deposit liabilities for the company from retail and institutional sources.
	Cultivate new clientele on a regular basis.
	Cultivate and maintain courteous and efficient relationship with clients.
	Timely response to feedback and other customer related issues or requests.
	Participate in creating new and better marketing based on field experience.
	Visit, engage prospects and maintain liability generated
	Propose services, upselling and cross-selling whenever possible
	Recruit, train and build sales team across the country
	Increase number of Treasury services taken up by Clients
	Ensure the effective, high-quality management of Clients
	Conduct periodic competitor analysis, reviewing product rates and requirements
	Prepare and send periodic report to management
	On-board and manage subordinates to maintain a consistently high number of prospects, and with a high conversion rate
	Train IMTs and Treasury Admin on the various Treasury products and relevant company policies.


Qualifications


	Minimum education level –First degree in any discipline from a reputable academic institution. Post-graduate qualification(s) and professional membership will be an added advantage.
	3+ years of experience in sales and business development.
	Demonstrated track record of meeting/exceeding goals as an individual contributor.
	Successful experience building a territory from little or nothing.
	Skilled at building rapport, opening doors, and understanding business requirements of senior decision makers.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: careers@conceptgroup-ng.com using the Job Title as the subject of the email.
